segments.text: What a surprising sight in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in drying that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, water is flooding out of the sink behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a slippery hazard on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in it calmly, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes on the counter seem forgotten.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a peaceful outdoor garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the boy is climbing the stool unsteadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching deep into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That tilt in the stool makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks up expectantly, palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing this sneaky moment joyfully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will turn and catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR
